Registration

Guidelines

MSS 2021 is a forum that will bring together innovative academics, researchers, students and other interested parties to discuss key topics and research findings from various fields in the world of science. With the slogan “Symbiosis: Exploring Extraordinary Possibilities“, the MSS organizing committee is calling for papers on any of these seven major categories:

  • Cellular Biology and Biochemistry
  • Chemistry and Drug Discovery
  • Applied Microbiology
  • Science Safety and Communication
  • Genomics and Bioinformatics
  • Food Science and Technology
  • Environmental Science

MSS 2021 aims to provide a platform for researchers with cross-disciplinary interests related to the above categories, to network, exchange ideas and interact with each other. All accepted abstracts will be featured in the conference programme e-booklet. The e-booklet will be distributed to all participants on the day of the event.

Key Dates

Date Description
3 Jan 2019 Deadline for something pretty important
7 Jan 2019 Registration does not close
10 Jan 2019 Early bird tickets

Abstract Submission and Acceptance

Please prepare your abstract according to the guidlines.

Abstract Guidelines

Once abstract is prepared according to the guidelines:

  • Submit your abstract through the online form here
  • Please fill in all fields in the online form accurately
  • Abstract authors will be acknowledged of the receipt of abstract via email within 5 working days.

If your abstract is accepted for oral/poster/PechaKucha presentation, the next steps are as follows:

  • Abstract authors will be notified via email that their abstract has been reviewed and accepted for presentation.
  • Authors will be supplied with more information regarding presentation format, content, etc. via email.
  • Accepted presenters must adhere to corresponding deadlines and guidelines, and should respond to communication.
  • Contact the MSS 2021 Editorial Board at mum-sciencesymposium@monash.edu should you not receive an acknowledgement email within 5 working days after abstract submission or for any other inquiries.
